trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control that can be used to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kontroll som kan användas till värd en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om kontrollen storleksändras för att visa hela innehållet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om kontrollen ändrar storleken för att passa innehållet. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om elementet värdbaserade har en genomskinlig bakgrund.

trans-unit.source: The BackColorTransparent property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackColorTransparent aktiverar bitmappen kopierar, vilket möjliggör finns element om du vill använda genomskinlighet över behållaren värden.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: Detta är användbart när elementet är på en bild toning bakgrund.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the BackColorTransparent property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: Av prestandaskäl, är egenskapen BackColorTransparent inaktiverat som standard.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om det värdbaserade elementet har en genomskinlig bakgrund. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när värdet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> egenskapsändringar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the BindingContextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen BindingContextChanged finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>egenskapen kan anges till ett värde som är aktiva för att aktivera stöd för IME.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>element, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som är värd för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but Child can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Endast ett element kan finnas men underordnade kan ha valfritt antal underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar standardstorleken för kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DefaultSize property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om egenskapen egenskapen finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> för kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Omedelbart Frigör alla systemresurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose` metod och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`anropar den skyddade `Dispose(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är `true`, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>referenser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.target: Inträffar när kontrollen dubbelklickas.

trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen DoubleClick finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen DragLeave finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Gör en <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> att ta emot tangentbordsmeddelanden korrekt när det öppnas modelessly från [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Anropa metoden EnableModelessKeyboardInterop för att vidarebefordra alla tangentbord meddelanden när en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] öppnas fönstret modelessly.

trans-unit.source: The EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnableModelessKeyboardInterop installerar meddelandefilter i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-baserat program.

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: Filtret vidarebefordrar alla tangentbord när lägeslöst fönster är aktiv.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] fönstret öppnas modelessly.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när kontrollen har angetts.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Enter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen markering finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om kontrollen har Ange fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om kontrollen har fokus; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätter basklass implementeringen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>att tillhandahålla rätt layout beteendet för den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Området anpassad storlek för en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.source: The computed by the control, given the constraints specified by proposedSize.
trans-unit.target: Den beräknas genom att den kontroll, baserat på villkor som anges av proposedSize .

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen GiveFeedback finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Inträffar när kontrollen får fokus.

trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen Markerades finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en överordnad behållare för den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Värd-behållaren är den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, vilket är den överordnade behållaren för värdbaserade element.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Behållaren värden är alltid i roten på den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] hierarki.

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access HostContainer directly.
trans-unit.target: För att komma åt överordnat elementet värdbaserade kommer du åt HostContainer direkt.

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: Överordnad behållare.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger IME-läge för en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: IME-läge för kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en kontrolls visning måste ritas om.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Invalidated event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen Invalidated finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Garanterar att alla WM_CHAR viktiga meddelanden vidarebefordras till värdbaserade elementet.

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element bearbetar inte `charCode`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>kontroll bearbetar den med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: Tecknet som ska vidarebefordra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i samtliga fall.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en tangent trycks medan kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the KeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen KeyDown finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen Tangenttryckning finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en tangent släpps medan kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Att en händelse utlöstes anropar händelsehanteraren via ett ombud.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnEnabledChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnEnabledChanged kan också härledda klasser att hantera händelsen utan att koppla en delegat.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Det här är den prioriterade metoden för att hantera händelse i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Data för händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnGotFocus method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om metoden VidMarkering finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnHandleCreated method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om metoden OnHandleCreated finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnLeave method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om metoden OnLeave finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the OnPaint method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>implementeringen av metoden OnPaint vidarebefordrar basklass-implementeringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Återger kontrollens bakgrund.

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPaintBackground återger överordnade kontrollens bakgrund till en utanför skärmen HBITMAP.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: Bitmappen används som bakgrund i elementet värdbaserade stöder transparens.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden stöder den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastrukturen och är inte avsedd att användas direkt från din kod.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om kontrollen ska rita.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Återgivningar kontrollen med angiven <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>som en egenskap har ändrats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på egenskapen som har ändrats och kräver översättning.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Det nya värdet för egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnVisibleChanged method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om metoden OnVisibleChanged finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när kontrollen har utfyllnad ändringar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PaddingChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen PaddingChanged finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> kontroll ritas.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av den här händelsen lägger till händelsehanterare basen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar före det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> händelse när en tangent trycks ned och fokus ligger på den här kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PreviewKeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen PreviewKeyDown finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Bearbetar en kommando-nyckel, se till att elementet värdbaserade har möjlighet att hantera kommandot innan normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Om ett meddelande om viktiga inte hanteras av den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, vidarebefordrar upp den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Klasshierarki för bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, skickas via referens som representerar fönstret meddelandet att bearbeta.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> värden som representerar nyckeln för att bearbeta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om tecknet som är en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] genvägen nyckel, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Bearbetar ett mnemoteknisk tecken, se till att elementet värdbaserade har möjlighet att hantera mnemonik före normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Om ett meddelande om viktiga inte hanteras av den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, vidarebefordrar upp den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Klasshierarki för bearbetning.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tecknet som ska bearbetas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om tecknet som är en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] genvägen nyckel, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar egenskapsmappning som avgör hur anger egenskaper på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> kontroll påverkar den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] och [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tekniker har två liknande egenskapen modeller.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Egenskapsmappning* stöder driftskompatibilitet mellan två arkitekturerna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Windows Forms och WPF egenskapsmappning](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref> som mappar <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"> </xref> till egenskaper på den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar under dra och släppa och möjliggör källan för dragåtgärden att avgöra om dra och släpp ska avbrytas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the QueryContinueDrag event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen QueryContinueDrag finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när kontrollen storleksändras.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Resize event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om storleksändringar finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>egenskapsvärde ändras.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the RightToLeftChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsen RightToLeftChanged finns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Skalar överordnad behållare och den värdbaserade [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Skalningsfaktorn för x-axeln.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Skalningsfaktorn för y-axeln.

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar värdbaserade elementet.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Välj metoden aktiverar värdbaserade elementet.

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Om mer än en värdbaserad elementet finns det första eller sista elementet aktiveras, beroende på den `directed` och `forward` parametrar.

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: Upprepad anrop till den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>metoden inte passerar via värdbaserade element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Välj efterföljande element genom att anropa den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>metoden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen vidarebefordrar fliken nycklar från [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] till [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att ange riktning för kontrollen att välja; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att gå vidare i tabbordningen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att flytta bakåt i tabbordningen.
